greeting.message: Can you stop staring, yes, those are my ears. I'm an elf.
greeting.opt2: I was just admiring your beauty, didn't mean to offend

apology.message: Oh okay, I'm sorry, even though I moved in here years ago some people still look at me weirdly.
apology.opt1: Was there any reason for you to move here?
apology.opt2: What's your opinion on local villagers?

fatherIntro.message: I'm looking for my father. He is a captain and a treasure seeker. He went missing 5 years ago. Since this is the most known fishing village I thought that this would be the best place to gather information.
fatherIntro.opt3: Any clue what happened to him?

captainInfo.message: Captain Theron Tidecaller, was quite famous for his discoveries and uncanny ability to predict weather conditions.
captainInfo.opt2: You also said he was a treasure seeker?

pirateInfo.message: No, not like that. He was more about the thrill of an adventure than plundering and murdering people.
pirateInfo.opt1: If I find any clues I'll let you know.
pirateInfo.opt2: Well, hope you can find him.

treasureInfo.message: Treasure seeks to dedicate their lives to search for ancient artifacts and valuable items. My dad is in possession of some of the rarest jewels. Though I have no idea where he keeps them.
treasureInfo.opt1: Do you need some kind of permit to become a treasure seeker?
treasureInfo.opt2: That must be a good way to earn some money. Your dad was probably quite rich.

permitInfo.message: Permit? Ha! Of course not, all you have to do is go to the most dangerous places and hope no one was there before.
permitInfo.opt1: I see, I'm something of an adventurer myself.

richnessInfo.message: IS rich. That I would like to say, but no. Money never stuck to him. He would always spend it on new gear, ship parts, or give it away.
richnessInfo.opt1: Surely he has something hidden away, right?

hiddenJewelsInfo.message: I don't know, we can ask him when I find him.

rumorSceptre.message: Last rumour I heard is that he was looking for Primula's Sceptre.

primulaInfo.message: Queen Primula, ruled over an ancient civilization called Messatan, believed to be long gone. It's probably just another fairytale.
primulaInfo.opt1: Why do you think it's a fairytale?
primulaInfo.opt2: Interesting, not surprising that your father would be interested.

fairytaleInfo.message: There is no known proof. All is just tales and rumors spread from ear to ear.
fairytaleInfo.opt1: You never know, there are a lot of mysteries in our world.

fatherPersonality.message: He is the best at his job, but he can be naive.
fatherPersonality.opt1: He seems to be quite a man, hopefully, you can find him

villagersOpinion.message: Useless, all they do is hang out in that stinky tavern. The only decent person living here is Marvin.
villagersOpinion.opt2: They can't be all that bad.

marvinInfo.message: An adventure like my father. Heard he came back a few days ago. He is a skilled warrior.

marvinLocation.message: He is probably training people in the local exploration guild.

villagersComment.message: Believe, you will have enough of every one of them after spending here significant amount of time here.
villagersComment.opt1: Seems to me that you're just venting your frustrations.
